name: Tiny Dungeon (Tinytouchtales)
description:
Tiny Dungeon

Made for the Ludum Dare #31.

Instructions
Use your Arrow-Keys or WASD to move the character. Bump into enemies to attack them. You have 5 move points. Based on the arrows on the tiles it is more/less difficult to move to the next tile.

@Tinytouchtales | Tinytouchtales.com
